participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Arjun is passionate about swimming and coaching. He is open-minded and enjoys a free-spirited lifestyle, often contrasting with his traditional family values.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is shy and introverted, often feeling out of place at school. She finds solace in gaming and has a vivid imagination.
participant_2.background: i do not have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.
